definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: The research center is carrying out a thorough study of this metal's superconductivity.
sentences.chinese: 正在對這種金屬的超導電性進行深入研究。

sentences.english: The effects of annealing on superconducting transition and the thermostability of MgB.
sentences.chinese: 超導體制備過程中的退火效應和熱穩定性的實驗研究。

sentences.english: Ordinary superconductivity is weird to begin with.
sentences.chinese: 普通超導現象的出現就是奇異的。

sentences.english: Superconductivity means no electrical resistance , and that in turn means no wasted power.
sentences.chinese: 超導性意味着零電阻，也就意味着沒有能量的浪費。

sentences.english: It presents a study of d. c. power supply unit for superconducting magnet.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了超導磁體電源研製的方法。

sentences.english: At last, the test curves of eight-channels HTS multiplexer are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出八信道高溫超導多路器的實際測試曲線。

sentences.english: The performances of HTS microstrip antennas on anisotropic substrates are studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析了各向異性襯底上的高溫超導微帶天線特性。

sentences.english: Study on the section-division of superconducting proton linac is carried out in detail.
sentences.chinese: 對超導直線加速器的分段進行了詳細的研究。

sentences.english: The problem on granular superconductivity is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 還對顆粒超導電性的問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: An analysis of the characteristic on index loss of high-temperature superconducting (HTS) magnet was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高溫超導磁體的指數損耗的特徵。

sentences.english: In this paper, the basic properties of superconducting switch for fluxing pump are discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 該文詳細地討論了用於磁通泵超導開關的基本特點。

sentences.english: The influence of different doping methods on the superconductivity and structure of BSCCO superconductor was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 比較了不同摻雜方法對超導體結構以及性能的影響。

sentences.english: Niobium is a soft metal used in producing superconducting steel.
sentences.chinese: 鈮是製造超導鋼製品的一種軟金屬。

sentences.english: Another new class of superconductors, based on iron instead of copper, was discovered a couple of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 而幾年前又發現用鐵代替銅的新型超導體。

sentences.english: The room temperature superconductor has been the "snark" of modern materials science...
sentences.chinese: 常溫超導體早已成爲現代科學材料中的奢侈品。

sentences.english: Superconductors carry electricity with no loss to resistance.
sentences.chinese: 超導體能沒有任何電阻地帶電。

definition: delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
